name: UV DLP Slicer Controller
tagline: A slicer and print controller for UV DLP based 3d printers
body:
### Welcome to Creation Workshop
This is a program used for controlling your 3d UV DLP printer. It combines both a slicer and controller. It can control a number of printer types that utilize RAMPS-like hardware.

### Authors and Contributors
Steve Hernandez aka PacManFan is the main code contributor. 
If you find this program useful, please consider contributing via paypal to pacmanfan321@gmail.com

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
